original_text: So the people went out from these places to see what had happened. They came to Jesus. The man that the bad spirits had come out of was sitting there, beside Jesus' feet. Now he was wearing clothes and his mind was well again. When the people saw this, they were afraid.
korean_text: 사람들이 그 이루어진 일을 보러 나와서 예수께 이르러 귀신 나간 사람이 옷을 입고 정신이 온전하여 예수의 발치에 앉아 있는 것을 보고 두려워하거늘

sentences.original_text: So the people went out from these places
The man that the bad spirits had come out of
was sitting there, beside Jesus' feet
sentences.korean_translation: 예수의 발 곁에 거기 앉아 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and his mind was well again
